src:
Iwan Bule Masuk Deretan Panjang Polisi Jadi Petinggi Negeri
03 Nov 2019, 06:59 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Sederet petinggi Polri sudah banyak di mengisi berbagai jabatan nomor satu di negeri ini. Salah satunya adalah Komjen Mochamad Iriawan yang terpilih menjadi orang nomor satu di PSSI.
Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023. Iwan Bule terpilih secara mutlak di Kongres PSSI.
Iwan Bule dinyatakan sebagai ketua umum setelah mengantongi 82 suara pada Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) pemilihan PSSi di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Dia mengalahkan 10 calon lainnya.
Saat berdinas di kepolisian, Iwan Bule pernah menjabat sebagai Direktur Reserse Kriminal Umum Polda Metro Jaya. Kemudian menjadi Kapolda Metro Jaya. DIa juga tercatat pernah menjadi Kapolda NTB dan Jabar.


Foto: Rifkianto Nugroho

Iwan Bule juga pernah menjadi Plt Gubernur Jawa Barat. Jabatannya saat ini adalah Sekretaris Utama Lemhanas.

Jenderal (Purn) Tito Karnavian Jadi Mendagri

Muhammad Tito Karnavian menjadi pilihan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) untuk mengisi posisi Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) di Kabinet Indonesia Maju. Saat memperkenalkan Tito sebagai Mendagri, Jokowi berpesan agar dia bersinergi dengan daerah hingga menyoroti regulasi terkait investasi.
"Menteri reformasi, harus sinergi dengan pemerintah daerah, mengenai data kependudukan, e-KTP berada di bawah tangan beliau. Termasuk masalah hukum di daerah, terutama yang berkaitan dengan investasi," ucap Jokowi, Rabu (23/10/2019).
Usai jadi Mendagri, Tito secara otomatis pensiun dari Polri. Sebelumnya, Tito pernah menjabat sebagai Kapolda Papua, Kapolda Metro Jaya, hingga Kepala BNPT.
text:
Iwan Bule is in the Long Rows of Police to Become State Officials
03 Nov 2019, 06:59 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - A number of Polri officials have filled many number one positions in this country. One of them was Komjen Mochamad Iriawan who was chosen to be number one in PSSI.
The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule was elected as the General Chairperson of the 2019-2023 PSSI period. Iwan Bule was absolutely elected at the PSSI Congress.
Iwan Bule was declared general chairman after pocketing 82 votes at the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) for the PSSi election at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). He defeated 10 other candidates.
While serving in the police, Iwan Bule had served as Director of the Jakarta Police's General Criminal Investigation. Then it became the Head of Metro Jaya Police. He was also noted to have been the NTB and West Java Regional Police Chief.


Photo: Rifkianto Nugroho

Iwan Bule was also the Acting Governor of West Java. His current position is the Main Secretary of Lemhanas.

General (Retired) Tito Karnavian Becomes Minister of Home Affairs

Muhammad Tito Karnavian was chosen by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) to fill the position of Minister of the Interior (Minister of Home Affairs) in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet. When introducing Tito as Minister of Home Affairs, Jokowi advised him to work in synergy with the regions to highlight regulations related to investment.
"The minister of reform, must synergize with the regional government, regarding population data, e-KTP is under his hands. Including legal issues in the region, especially relating to investment," said Jokowi, Wednesday (10/23/2019).
After becoming Minister of Home Affairs, Tito automatically retired from the National Police. Previously, Tito had served as the Papua Police Chief, Metro Jaya Police Chief, and the Head of BNPT.
